description: As an example, some homebrew gamers use a program called Mymenuify to customize their Wii's menu theme. Mymenuify produces .MYM files, which contain an .INI file and two BRLAN files.
Other homebrew gamers use a program called Benzin to modify Wii banners. Benzin allows gamers to convert BRLAN files into editable XML files.
NOTE: In Mario Kart Wii, BRLAN files are stored in the game's anim directories.
